Title: [ANN][KSS] Krosscoin : Lets make good happen [Waves and Ethereum Blockchain]
Body: **** IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT *****  Dear Community,  KSS-Waves is back into the krosscoin project. The coming Kross Blockchain is a third generation blockchain and will allow for interoperability with other other blockchains, including Ethereum and Waves. Also and obviously, dapps will be able to be created on the Kross Blockchain. The Kross Blockchain will have one of the fastest transaction speeds and scalability in the world. We believe that smart contracts will be more advanced in the waves platform and allow for the development of dapps on the platform. Also atomic swaps is crucial to krosscoin’s vision of a universal app monetization. Due to these reasons, the kss-waves token is back on the Krosscoin project.  KSS-Waves had an original 1 billion max supply but now has 544,234,042.614 max supply. The remaining has been burned.  Our coming Kross Blockchain will have its own token KSS-Kross with a maximum supply of 21 million. An ICO at $2/KSS-Kross will be done with the KSS-Kross to raise funds for operations and further development. 10.5 million KSS-Kross will be offered in the ICO. If hard cap is reached through a private sale, then ICO will not be held.  Currently, we also have KSS-ETH with a max supply of 100 million. 3.6 million KSS are involved in token swaps worth $1m, more token swaps are on the way. 3 million KSS are in circulation  The KSS-ETH will have a total circulation of 10 million. And this 10 million circulation will swap with KSS-Kross at this rate: 4.8 KSS-ETH = 1 KSS-Kross.  Only the 10 million KSS-ETH in circulation will be part of this swap rate. And this swap event will commence immediately the Kross Blockchain is on mainnet and will happen till end of the KSS-Kross ICO or till when the hardcap is met.  After the ICO of KSS-Kross or hardcap met, the remaining 90 million KSS-ETH supply will swap with KSS-Kross at this rate: 90 KSS-ETH = 1 KSS-Kross.  Also after the ICO of KSS-Kross or hardcap met, KSS-waves will swap thus: 555 KSS-waves = 1 KSS-Kross 55 KSS-waves = 1 KSS-Eth  For now, KSS waves will swap with KSS-ETH at this rate: 555 KSS-Waves = 1 KSS-Eth This is the swap rate till the Kross blockchain is on mainnet, after mainnet, KSS-Waves will swap to KSS-Eth at this rate: 55 KSS-Waves = 1 KSS-Eth.  This way all tokens of KSS Waves and all tokens of KSS-ETh will each swap with a total of 1 million KSS-Kross.  There will be a limited allocation of KSS-Kross designed to accomodate any future krosscoin tokens created on any future relevant blockchain.  Our goal is flexibility, versatility, interoperability and mass adoption of the Kross Monetization API. This is crucial to our vision of being the largest ecosystem in the decentralized mobile app market, which is the future.  Thanks for your support so far. Body: WHAT IS KROSSCOIN? What’s its mission?  Krosscoin is a very elegant concept: we build innovative apps that have a large customer base potential. We also allow third-party developer apps into our ecosystem. All apps are monetized with KSS tokens using a ‘’PAY-AS-YOU-USE’’ framework.  This allows app developers to make interesting and highly functional apps, and lets the end-consumer pay for only the functions accessed, when they  Our first apps utilizing the Krosscoin Platform is the patent pending Pipdroid app family. Pipdroid apps lets forex and crypto traders launch and manage trading bots right from their smartphones. Imagine being able to access and launch bots to both forex broker platforms and crypto exchanges, right from your hand held device, anywhere you are!!.  The Krosscoin Team’s mission is to have krosscoin ecosystem showcase a plethora of innovative and disruptive application solutions within the next 5 years. The KSS token being the monetization currency on solutions serving millions of users or consumers around the world. The partnership forged with both world-class and upcoming developers in both developed and developing countries will create an innovation culture within the Krosscoin global team. Using Blockchain technology to bridge gaps, improve communication, foster trade, develop healthcare solutions, disrupt fintech, and improve certain government processes, the KSS token stands to be among the top 20 cryptocurrencies in the world by 2020.  The first apps in the ecosystem is the Pipdroid app family, and the Ribbon app. Automated trading is done by over 10 million people daily. However traders have been limited by stationary infrastructure with majority of them having to maintain expensive monthly costs just to launch a bot. Pipdroids drastically reduces costs by offering a cloud bot management mobile platform, where traders can launch bots to several markets; forex, commodities, cryptocurrencies, anything the Pipdroid API is connected to.  Pipdroid Pearl and Pipdroid Petal are released already as proof of concept limited beta on the Google Play store. These apps have a potential market of 5 million users conservatively, who use the Metatrader platforms via several forex brokers. Pipdroid Pearl launches to MT5 platform, while Pipdroid Petal launches to Metatrader 4 platform. Over 40 forex broker demo and live severs from over 12 popular forex brokers are connected to these apps. Automated trading is now mobile, thanks to the Krosscoin ingenuity.  The mobile app market is estimated to be at $188.9B by 2020 (Source: Statista, 2018). With an annual growth rate of 30%, the mobile app market will reach $1.5T by the year 2028. Krosscoin’s mission is to capture $100B market share by the year 2028. The Krosscoin project will achieve this by establishing a great presence in the fast growing developing countries in Africa and Asia, through several innovative million user applications, all monetized with KSS tokens or corresponding native token in the future Kross Blockchain. Body: This week we will release a video demonstration of Pipdroid Pearl. I also created a second bot based on the Parabolic SAR. It has 2 modes. Title: [ANN][KSS] Krosscoin : Lets make good happen [Waves and Ethereum Blockchain]
Body: Krosscoin (KSS) (Updated Announcement: August 26, 2017)                                                                           Krosscoin - A cross-platform app monetization platform  (Rebranding)  KSS introduces a consumption-based token framework that allows application developers to monetize any functional component. Traditional subscription-based licensing limits user adoption while freemium models require an ever expanding set of micro-transactions. Consumption-based removes the adoption obstacles inherent in monthly subscriptions while freeing the developer to focus on application functionality. With KSS, monetization increases alongside usage, incentivizing application developers to create a compelling user experience. In addition to providing the underlying platform for any application developer to utilize, Krosscoin as a business is also actively developing mobile applications that natively utilize the KSS currency.                                                                                                          Website                                                                                                      www.Krosscoin.io  Dear Community,  KSS-Waves is back into the krosscoin project. The coming Kross Blockchain is a third generation blockchain and will allow for interoperability with other other blockchains, including Ethereum and Waves. Also and obviously, dapps will be able to be created on the Kross Blockchain. The Kross Blockchain will have one of the fastest transaction speeds and scalability in the world. We believe that smart contracts will be more advanced in the waves platform and allow for the development of dapps on the platform. Also atomic swaps is crucial to krosscoin’s vision of a universal app monetization. Due to these reasons, the kss-waves token is back on the Krosscoin project.  KSS-Waves had an original 1 billion max supply but now has 544,234,042.614 max supply. The remaining has been burned.  Our coming Kross Blockchain will have its own token KSS-Kross with a maximum supply of 21 million. An ICO at $2/KSS-Kross will be done with the KSS-Kross to raise funds for operations and further development. 10.5 million KSS-Kross will be offered in the ICO. If hard cap is reached through a private sale, then ICO will not be held.  Currently, we also have KSS-ETH with a max supply of 100 million. 3.6 million KSS are involved in token swaps worth $1m, more token swaps are on the way. 3 million KSS are in circulation  The KSS-ETH will have a total circulation of 10 million. And this 10 million circulation will swap with KSS-Kross at this rate: 4.8 KSS-ETH = 1 KSS-Kross.  Only the 10 million KSS-ETH in circulation will be part of this swap rate. And this swap event will commence immediately the Kross Blockchain is on mainnet and will happen till end of the KSS-Kross ICO or till when the hardcap is met.  After the ICO of KSS-Kross or hardcap met, the remaining 90 million KSS-ETH supply will swap with KSS-Kross at this rate: 90 KSS-ETH = 1 KSS-Kross.  Also after the ICO of KSS-Kross or hardcap met, KSS-waves will swap thus: 555 KSS-waves = 1 KSS-Kross 55 KSS-waves = 1 KSS-Eth  For now, KSS waves will swap with KSS-ETH at this rate: 555 KSS-Waves = 1 KSS-Eth This is the swap rate till the Kross blockchain is on mainnet, after mainnet, KSS-Waves will swap to KSS-Eth at this rate: 55 KSS-Waves = 1 KSS-Eth.  This way all tokens of KSS Waves and all tokens of KSS-ETh will each swap with a total of 1 million KSS-Kross.  There will be a limited allocation of KSS-Kross designed to accomodate any future krosscoin tokens created on any future relevant blockchain.  Our goal is flexibility, versatility, interoperability and mass adoption of the Kross Monetization API. This is crucial to our vision of being the largest ecosystem in the decentralized mobile app market, which is the future.  Thanks for your support so far.
